description: Baseline schema that loaders fall back to when no config path is provided.

benchmarks.description: Mapping of benchmark labels to column names.

spx.description: Example benchmark mapping for the S&P 500.

tsx.description: Example benchmark mapping for the TSX.

data.description: Data input configuration validated at startup.

allow_risk_free_fallback.description: Opt-in heuristic to use lowest-vol column

columns.description: Subset of columns to load from the returns CSV.

csv_path.description: Path to a single returns CSV file.

currency.description: Reporting currency for inputs and outputs.

indices_glob.description: Glob for benchmark index CSV inputs.

managers_glob.description: Glob for manager return CSV inputs.

missing_fill_limit.description: Maximum consecutive periods to forward-fill missing data.

risk_free_column.description: Explicit risk-free series name when present

universe_membership_path.description: Optional CSV with universe membership overrides.

autofit_columns.description: Auto size Excel columns to fit content.

conditional_bands.description: Conditional formatting bands for Excel exports.

enabled.description: Enable conditional formatting bands in Excel.

palette.description: Color palette name for Excel conditional bands.

number_format.description: Default numeric format for Excel output.

formats.description: List of export formats to write.

include_raw_returns.description: Include raw return series in exports.

compute.description: Legacy metrics list for reporting exports.

registry.description: Metric registry identifiers for score frame.

rf_rate_annual.description: flat rf or link to series

max_funds.description: Maximum funds selected in multi-period runs.

min_funds.description: Minimum funds required in multi-period runs.

periods.description: Consecutive periods required for sigma1 trigger.
Consecutive periods required for sigma2 trigger.

portfolio.description: Portfolio controls validated before running analyses.

custom_weights.description: Explicit weight overrides keyed by manager name.

AnnualReturn.description: Weight for annual return in blended score.

MaxDrawdown.description: Weight for max drawdown in blended score.

Sharpe.description: Weight for Sharpe ratio in blended score.

log_method_switches.description: log when switching to safe mode

weighting_scheme.description: equal | risk_parity | hrp | erc | robust_mv | robust_risk_parity | custom

log_prices.description: turn on if prices span decades

limit.description: max consecutive periods to forward-fill (None = unlimited)

per_asset_limit.description: optional forward-fill window overrides per asset

steps.description: Optional list of preprocessing steps to run in order.

proxy.description: Benchmark proxy used for regime detection.

risk_off_fund_count_multiplier.description: Scale fund count in risk-off regime.

risk_off_target_vol_multiplier.description: Scale target volatility in risk-off regime.

jobs.description: Parallel worker count for a run.

log_file.description: Log file path for runtime logs.

seed.description: Random seed used for deterministic runs.

vol_adjust.description: Risk target configuration for volatility control.

warmup_periods.description: zero weights for first N periods
